statements: SELECT team_name, team_country FROM TeamRoster WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM TeamRoster WHERE foundation_year > 2010;
SELECT team_name, coach_name FROM TeamRoster WHERE team_country = 'Spain' ORDER BY team_name ASC;
SELECT team_name, team_country, foundation_year FROM TeamRoster WHERE foundation_year BETWEEN 2000 AND 2010;
SELECT coach_name, team_name, team_country FROM TeamRoster ORDER BY team_country DESC, coach_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM TeamRoster WHERE team_country = 'USA'
SELECT team_name, coach_name FROM TeamRoster WHERE foundation_year > 2000 ORDER BY foundation_year DESC
SELECT team_name, team_country FROM TeamRoster WHERE foundation_year BETWEEN 1990 AND 2000 ORDER BY team_country ASC
SELECT coach_name FROM TeamRoster WHERE team_name LIKE '%United%'
SELECT team_name, team_country, coach_name FROM TeamRoster WHERE coach_name IS NULL
SELECT * FROM TeamRoster ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT team_name, team_location FROM TeamRoster WHERE roster_count > 10;
SELECT player_name, contract_value FROM PlayerContracts WHERE contract_duration > 2 ORDER BY contract_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM TeamRoster WHERE team_location LIKE '%New%' OR team_location LIKE '%York%';
SELECT team_name, roster_count FROM TeamRoster WHERE roster_count < 20 AND team_location = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT * FROM TeamRoster WHERE roster_count > 10 ORDER BY team_name ASC, team_location DESC;
SELECT team_name, team_location FROM TeamRoster WHERE team_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT team_name, roster_count FROM TeamRoster WHERE team_location = 'New York' OR team_location = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT * FROM PlayerContracts WHERE contract_duration >= 3 ORDER BY player_position ASC, contract_value DESC;
SELECT player_name, contract_value FROM PlayerContracts WHERE contract_value > 500000 AND contract_duration < 5;
SELECT * FROM Team_Rosters;
SELECT team_name, region FROM Team_Rosters WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, salary FROM Player_Contracts WHERE contract_start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_id, kills, assists FROM Player_Stats ORDER BY kills DESC;
SELECT * FROM Team_Rosters JOIN Player_Contracts ON Team_Rosters.team_id = Player_Contracts.team_id;
SELECT * FROM Team_Rosters ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT player_name, salary, team_name, region FROM Player_Contracts pc JOIN Team_Rosters tr ON pc.team_id = tr.team_id WHERE pc.salary > 5000;
SELECT player_name, kills, deaths, assists FROM Player_Stats ps JOIN Player_Contracts pc ON ps.player_id = pc.player_id WHERE ps.matches_played > 50 ORDER BY kills DESC;
SELECT team_name, COUNT(player_id) AS total_players FROM Player_Contracts pc JOIN Team_Rosters tr ON pc.team_id = tr.team_id GROUP BY team_name;
SELECT team_name, AVG(salary) AS average_salary FROM Player_Contracts pc JOIN Team_Rosters tr ON pc.team_id = tr.team_id WHERE region = 'NA';
SELECT * FROM team_roster;
SELECT team_name, player_name FROM team_roster ORDER BY team_name ASC;
SELECT player_name, player_position FROM players WHERE player_salary > 50000;
SELECT team_name, count(player_id) as num_players FROM team_roster GROUP BY team_name;
SELECT team_name, region FROM teams WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT team_name, player_name FROM team_roster
SELECT team_name, player_position FROM teams INNER JOIN players ON teams.team_id = players.player_id
SELECT player_name, player_salary FROM players WHERE player_salary > 100000
SELECT team_name, count(player_id) as total_players FROM team_roster GROUP BY team_name
SELECT player_name, team_name FROM team_roster ORDER BY team_name ASC, player_name DESC
SELECT * FROM Team;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM Player WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT tournament_name, start_date, end_date FROM Tournament ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT player_name, salary FROM Player JOIN Contract ON Player.player_id = Contract.player_id WHERE Contract.start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT team_name FROM Team WHERE team_id IN (SELECT team_id FROM Tournament_Participation WHERE tournament_id = 1);
SELECT * FROM Team;
SELECT team_name, team_id FROM Team ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT player_name, salary FROM Player p JOIN Contract c ON p.player_id = c.player_id WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT t.tournament_name, tp.team_id FROM Tournament t JOIN Tournament_Participation tp ON t.tournament_id = tp.tournament_id WHERE start_date < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY team_id ASC;

SELECT p.player_name, t.tournament_name FROM Player p JOIN Contract c ON p.player_id = c.player_id JOIN Tournament_Participation tp ON p.team_id = tp.team_id JOIN Tournament t ON tp.tournament_id = t.tournament_id WHERE salary > 5000 AND end_date < '2023-12-31';
